short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accurately verify emails in bulk. The top tool for checking mail address authenticity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bulk Email Verifier & Checker verifies if an email address is valid. 
The goal of email verification is to ensure that a real person with a valid email address will receive your email. 
Bulk Email Verifier & Checker can help you avoid bounces and protect your sender's reputation. 
It can also help you clean your email list from old and invalid emails. 

Bulk Email Verifier & Checker can catch typos or other mistakes that might result in misdirects and bounces.

# Features
✓ Email Address Validation: Ensures a string is a valid email.
✓ MX Record Validation: Verifies DNS MX records of the domain.
✓ Misc Validation: including Free email provider check, Role account validation, Disposable emails address (DEA) validation
✓ Email Reachability: checks how confident in sending an email to the address
✓ Bulk verify Email Addresses
✓ Easy import of Email Addresses from a CSV file
✓ Save verified history list

# Why Email Verification?
* Avoid Bounces: Ensure a real person with a valid email address receives your communication.
* Protect Sender Reputation: A clean email list enhances the sender's reputation and reduces the chance of being flagged as spam.
* List Cleaning: Remove old and invalid emails to maintain a high-quality recipient list.
* Reduce Misdirects: Catch and fix typos to ensure the right recipients get your emails.

# What data can be exported?
Email Address
Checked (Does the server check it?)
reachable (Email reachability)
username
domain
syntaxValid (Email syntax valid)
gravatar
suggestion (Typo check)
Disposable (Disposable email address validation)
role_account (Role account validation)
free (Free email provider Check)
has_mx_records (DNS records validation)

# Easy to Start
1. Click on 'Add New Check Task' Button.
2. Input Email Addresses or upload a CSV containing them.
3. Click 'Start to Verify' Button.

# Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers.
